problem: Develop a feature-rich Discord music bot (ZMusica1) with multi-source audio/video playback, dual command interfaces (prefix/slash), interactive player UI, advanced queue management, permissions, and persistence.
context: The bot needs to handle asynchronous operations, integrate yt-dlp, manage state per guild, synchronize command and UI interactions, handle errors robustly, and be configurable. Modularity via Cogs is preferred. Key libraries: discord.py, asyncio, yt-dlp, json. External dependency: ffmpeg.
